alert.note: Alert for Northern Washington; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Washington and northern Bennington Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pawlet, or 10 miles north of Salem, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Granville, Dorset, Manchester Center, Porter, Rupert, Peru, Beartown, Braymer School, Peru Town Center, Intervale, East Hebron, South Granville, Tiplady, Barnumville, West Pawlet, Freedleyville, West Rupert, Bromley Village and South Dorset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
